title: In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [April 2010]
creator_credit: Reginald Relf, Ralph Basson, John Vincent, Jack Holdsworth, Hugh Melville, Grant Coultman-Smith, Gordon White, Con Bell, Bob Gatherum, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Nine Victorian war veterans tell of their service during various wars for Australia. Covering World War II and the Vietnam War, these men share their experiences, joys and traumas of this time that would shape the rest of their lives. Created as part of ‘In our words : stories from Victorian veterans’ Digital Storytelling project at ACMI.
